title: GST Registration
shortDesc: Get your GSTIN in 3‚Äì5 working days. Mandatory for businesses above ‚Çπ40L turnover.
longDesc: GST Registration is mandatory for businesses with an annual turnover exceeding ‚Çπ40 lakhs (‚Çπ20 lakhs for special category states). Our experts handle the entire process ‚Äî from document preparation to GSTIN activation ‚Äî so you stay compliant from day one.

processSteps.title: Document Upload
processSteps.description: Submit PAN, Aadhaar, bank statement and address proof via app.

processSteps.title: Application Filing
processSteps.description: Our CA files your GST application on the GSTN portal.

processSteps.title: ARN Generation
processSteps.description: Acknowledgement Reference Number generated ‚Äî track status live.

processSteps.title: GSTIN Issued
processSteps.description: Government issues your 15-digit GSTIN and certificate.

reviews.comment: Very smooth process. Got GSTIN in 4 days!
Expert answered all my queries on WhatsApp. Excellent service.

title: Private Limited Company Registration
shortDesc: Register your Pvt Ltd company end-to-end. Includes MCA filing, DSC, and DIN.
longDesc: Incorporate your Private Limited Company with complete end-to-end support. We handle Director Identification Numbers (DIN), Digital Signature Certificates (DSC), name reservation, and MCA incorporation certificate ‚Äî everything you need to start operating legally.

processSteps.title: Name Reservation
processSteps.description: File RUN (Reserve Unique Name) on MCA portal. 2 name options suggested.

processSteps.title: DSC & DIN
processSteps.description: Digital Signature Certificates and Director Identification Numbers obtained.

processSteps.title: SPICe+ Filing
processSteps.description: MOA, AOA, and SPICe+ form filed with Ministry of Corporate Affairs.

processSteps.title: Incorporation Certificate
processSteps.description: MCA issues Certificate of Incorporation with CIN number.

reviews.comment: Fastest incorporation I've seen. Done in 12 days!
Good service. A bit of back-and-forth on documents but team was responsive.

title: ITR Filing ‚Äî Business
shortDesc: Income Tax Return filing for proprietorships, partnerships, and companies. Audit support included.
longDesc: Accurate, on-time Income Tax Return filing for all business structures. Our team of CAs reviews your financials, optimises deductions, and ensures your ITR is filed before the deadline ‚Äî with audit support if required.

processSteps.title: Document Review
processSteps.description: Share P&L, balance sheet, Form 26AS and TDS certificates.

processSteps.title: Tax Computation
processSteps.description: CA prepares computation, identifies deductions under Section 80.

processSteps.title: Your Approval
processSteps.description: Review the draft computation and confirm via app.

processSteps.title: ITR Filed
processSteps.description: Return filed and acknowledgement shared instantly.

reviews.comment: Saved ‚Çπ28,000 in taxes through proper deductions. Worth every rupee.

title: Trademark Registration
shortDesc: Protect your brand name and logo. TM filing with IP India in 5 categories.
longDesc: Your brand is your biggest asset. Secure it with Trademark Registration under the Trade Marks Act. We handle class identification, comprehensive search, application filing, and follow up with the IP India trademark registry until your TM is registered.

processSteps.title: Brand Search
processSteps.description: Comprehensive search for conflicting marks in your chosen class.

processSteps.title: Application Preparation
processSteps.description: Trademark form TM-A prepared with class and logo details.

processSteps.title: IP India Filing
processSteps.description: Application filed with IP India and application number issued.

processSteps.title: TM Certificate
processSteps.description: Trademark certificate issued. Full registration takes 18‚Äì24 months.

reviews.comment: Quick filing. Got application number same day. Very professional.

title: MSME / Udyam Registration
shortDesc: Get your Udyam certificate in 1 day. Unlock government benefits, loans, and subsidies.
longDesc: Udyam Registration (formerly MSME Registration) is free, online, and gives your business access to priority sector lending, government tenders, interest subsidies, and credit guarantees. Our team completes the registration in just one day.

processSteps.title: Aadhaar Verification
processSteps.description: OTP-based Aadhaar verification of proprietor/director.

processSteps.title: Business Details
processSteps.description: NIC code, investment, and turnover details filled.

processSteps.title: Certificate Issued
processSteps.description: Udyam certificate with unique Udyam number issued instantly.

reviews.comment: Done in 2 hours! Got my MSME certificate the same day. Highly recommend.

title: ROC Annual Compliance
shortDesc: File MGT-7, AOC-4 and DIR-3 KYC on time. Avoid ‚Çπ100/day penalty.
longDesc: Every Private Limited Company must file Annual Returns (MGT-7) and Financial Statements (AOC-4) with the MCA. Missing deadlines incurs ‚Çπ100 per day penalty per form. Our compliance team ensures timely filing with zero hassle.

processSteps.title: Financial Review
processSteps.description: Share audited financials and board resolution.

processSteps.title: Form Preparation
processSteps.description: MGT-7 and AOC-4 forms prepared by CS.

processSteps.title: Director DSC
processSteps.description: Forms digitally signed by directors.

processSteps.title: MCA Filing
processSteps.description: Forms filed on MCA21 portal. SRN issued.

reviews.comment: Filed before deadline, no penalties. Great team!
